com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

Class SpenSimpleView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine.SpenSimpleView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback, SpenSimpleViewInterface, SpenSettingViewEraserInterface, SpenSettingViewInterface, SpenSettingViewPenInterface, SpenSettingViewRemoverInterface, SpenSettingViewSelectionInterface

    public class SpenSimpleView
extends View
implements SpenSimpleViewInterface
    This class provides methods for managing a simple view based GL. This class does not support text box object, shape object, image object, container object, replay, multi-layer
    Since:
    4.1.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.SpenSettingViewPenInterface

      • SpenSimpleView

        public SpenSimpleView(Context context,
              AttributeSet attrs,
              int defStyleAttr)
        Creates an SpenSimpleView instance with the specified XML attributes and a class-specific default style.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context for your application.
        attrs - The XML attributes for the view.
        defStyleAttr - The default style to apply to this view. Set to 0 to apply no style beyond what is included in the theme. This can be an attribute resource value retrieved from the current theme or an explicit style resource.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If context is null.
        Since:
        4.1.0
        See Also:
        SpenSimpleView(Context), SpenSimpleView(Context, AttributeSet)

      • setPageDoc

        public boolean setPageDoc(SpenPageDoc pageDoc,
                 boolean isUpdate)
        Set the specified PageDoc instance to the current view.
        Specified by:
        setPageDoc in interface SpenSimpleViewInterface
        Parameters:
        pageDoc - The PageDoc instance that you want to set.
        isUpdate - Set to true to update the screen, set to false to not update the screen.
        Returns:
        true if the PageDoc instance is successfully set. false if the PageDoc instance is not set.
        Throws:
        OutOfMemoryError - Thrown if there is insufficient memory available.
        Since:
        4.1.0

      • captureCurrentView

        public Bitmap captureCurrentView(boolean includeBlank)
        Get the bitmap of the current view.
        Specified by:
        captureCurrentView in interface SpenSimpleViewInterface
        Parameters:
        includeBlank - Set to true to include a blank in the captured bitmap, set to false to capture only the screen without the blank.
        Returns:
        The Bitmap instance of the captured screen. Recycle the bitmap after use to prevent memory leaks.
        Throws:
        OutOfMemoryError - Thrown if device run out of memory
        Since:
        4.1.4
